articles.author: Amy B Wang
articles.title: Biden forcefully condemns Trump's NATO comments as 'un-American' - The Washington Post
articles.description: “It’s dumb. It’s shameful. It’s dangerous. It’s un-American,” Biden said Tuesday of Trump’s remarks at a campaign rally in South Carolina over the weekend.
articles.content: President Biden on Tuesday forcefully condemned as un-American comments by former president Donald Trump in which he said he would encourage Russia to invade NATO allies if those countries did not sp… [+3505 chars]

articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.title: Another Private Company Is Taking A Shot At Landing On The Moon — Here’s How To Watch - Forbes
articles.description: Intuitive Machine’s Odysseus lander, carrying a payload of NASA experiments and Koons sculptures, is heading to the moon atop a SpaceX rocket where it could become the first American spacecraft to touch down in decades.
articles.content: Houston-based Intuitive Machines is launching a spacecraft to the moon early on Wednesday, eying a landing that would mark the first time a private company has ever touched down on the lunar surface … [+3035 chars]

articles.title: US: First next-gen spacesuit pass crucial NASA test, will be used by astronauts outside space station - WION
articles.description: A private US firm has passed a crucial milestone test for creating advanced spacesuits to be used outside the International Space Station (ISS). American space agency National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) said the new design promises a good fit…
